titles.title: You do not know the way to go, but I do,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You do not know the way to go, but I do,
You do not know how to think, but I do,
You do not know what to say, but I do,
You do not know how to live, but I do.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
So give me your hand and let Me lead you.
Give me your mind let Me transform you,
Give me your mouth let Me speak through you,
Give me your life, and I will give you Mine.
